metadata.title: Lavish Black Lace Front Zipper Corset
features: Can be worn as lingerie, or outerwear!
Authentic corset from the famous corset brand Daisy Corsets
Runs true to size, please refer to our size chart to the left when ordering
description: Fullbust corset made of high quality satin with lace net overlay Premium front hidden zipper closure 10 plastic bones with 4 static steel back bones Nickel brass grommets with thick cording in the back for cinching Privacy Panel in the back Garter Loops Dry Clean Only
